translations: 洋洋得意地；活泼地；快活地

sentences.sentence: He walked jauntily into the café.
sentences.translation: 他昂首阔步地走进了咖啡馆。

sentences.sentence: He set off jauntily, whistling to himself.
sentences.translation: 他吹着口哨神气活现地出发了。

sentences.sentence: His straw hat stuck jauntily on the side of his head.
sentences.translation: 他那顶草帽时髦地斜扣在头上。
